content.prompt: The data in the tables most likely indicate which of the following?

choices.label: The Union had more educated leadership in its army than did the Confederacy.
The Confederacy more typically enlisted enslaved African Americans to fill its army.
The Union had a larger and more diverse population of workers to enlist from than did the Confederacy.
The Confederacy had more wealthy people in its armed forces than did the Union.

topic.text: 5.8: Military Conflict in the Civil War

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
